014package org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.transaction.internal;
015
016import java.lang.reflect.Method;
017import java.util.Objects;
018import java.util.stream.Stream;
019
020import org.jdbi.v3.core.Handle;
021import org.jdbi.v3.core.HandleCallback;
022import org.jdbi.v3.core.transaction.TransactionException;
023import org.jdbi.v3.core.transaction.TransactionIsolationLevel;
024import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.Handler;
025import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.HandlerDecorator;
026import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.transaction.Transaction;
027
028public class TransactionDecorator implements HandlerDecorator {
029    @Override
030    public Handler decorateHandler(Handler base, Class<?> sqlObjectType, Method method) {
031        final Transaction txnAnnotation = Stream.of(method, sqlObjectType)
032                .map(ae -> ae.getAnnotation(Transaction.class))
033                .filter(Objects::nonNull)
034                .findFirst()
035                .orElseThrow(() -> new TransactionException("No @Transaction annotation found"));
036        final TransactionIsolationLevel isolation = txnAnnotation.value();
037        final boolean readOnly = txnAnnotation.readOnly();
038
039        return (target, args, handle) -> {
040            Handle h = handle.getHandle();
041
042            if (h.isInTransaction() && h.isReadOnly() && !readOnly) {
043                throw new TransactionException("Tried to execute a nested @Transaction(readOnly=false) "
044                        + "inside a readOnly transaction");
045            }
046
047            HandleCallback<Object, Exception> callback = th -> base.invoke(target, args, handle);
048
049            final boolean flipReadOnly = readOnly != h.isReadOnly();
050            if (flipReadOnly) {
051                h.setReadOnly(readOnly);
052            }
053
054            try {
055                return h.inTransaction(isolation, callback);
056            } finally {
057                if (flipReadOnly) {
058                    h.setReadOnly(!readOnly);
059                }
060            }
061        };
062    }
063}
